name: 陳銘崑
objective: 本課程旨在以探討作業管理相關理論及議題，如供應鏈、精實與敏捷生產系統、豐田看板系統、長鞭效應、國際共應鏈及物流、CPFR、及專案管理。除外，亦針對不同產業供應鏈作探討，如Zara、McDonalds、Walmart、Apple。
schedule:
Week 1(3/1) : 課程說明與評分
Week 2(3/8) : 作業管理概論 
                    Types of Production Processes/What is Supply Chain 
                    Management?/Operations and Supply Chain Management - Introduction and 
                      Process 
Week 3(3/15) : Supply Chain Strategy - Introduction, Types and Global Strategies/
　　　　　　Suppy Chain Operations Reference Model (SCOR)
Week 4(3/22) : What is 6 Sigma ?
                         What is Lean Production                  
Week 5(3/29) : About Agile and Lean
                        What is AGILE Manufacturing?
Week 6(4/5) :  清明節
Week 7(4/12) : TOYOTA Production System; Kanban Production
Week 8 (4/19):Bullwhip Effect
                        Supply Chain Management: The Beer Game
Week 9(4/26):What is Logistics Management Definition & Importance in Supply   Chain
                       Logistics Management Definition & Importance in Supply Chain
Week 10(5/3) : Global Supply Chain Management - Participants and Operations 
                        Vendor Managed Inventory (VMI): Three Keys to Success
Week 11(5/10) : Logistics Service Levels 1PL - 5 PL
                          DHL International Supply Chain
Week 12(5/17): What is Project Time Management?
Week 13(5/24):CPFR 
                         Collaborative Planning: A Case Study
Week 14(5/31): Supply Chain Management of ZARA
Week 15(6/7): McDonalds Supply Chain
Week 16(6/14): Walmart Supply Chain
Week 17(6/21): Apple Supply Chain  
Week 18(6/28): 博班資格考
